Package com.persistit.logging

Implements Persistit™'s logging mechanism and provides a simple method for connecting Persistit's log output to the embedding application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PersistitLogger
    Simple interface for attaching an external logger.
    PersistitLogMessage.LogItem
    Interface for a loggable item.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApacheCommonsLogAdapter
    Wraps an org.apache.commons.logging.Log for Persistit logging.
    DefaultPersistitLogger
    The default implementation of logging for Persistit.
    JDK14LoggingAdapter
    Wraps a JDK 1.4 java.util.logging.Logger for Persistit logging.
    Log4JAdapter
    Wraps a Log4J org.apache.log4j.Logger for Persistit logging.
    LogBase
    Log message and configuration mechanism for Persistit's internal logging method.
    PersistitLogMessage
    A template for a Persisit log message.
    Slf4jAdapter
    Wraps an org.slf4j.Logger instance for Persistit logging.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PersistitLevel  

Package com.persistit.logging Description

Implements Persistit™'s logging mechanism and provides a simple method for connecting Persistit's log output to the embedding application. The default logger writes log messages to the file persistit.log and overwrites that file each time Persistit is initialized.

To override the default logger, for example, to route Persistit's log messages to the embedding application's logging subsystem, implement a subclass of DefaulttPersistitLogger and install it with the static setPersistitLogger method of Persistit.

Also see the JDK14LoggingAdapter, Log4JAdapter and ApacheCommonsLogAdapter classes, which wrap a JDK 1.4 java.util.logging.Logger, org.apache.log4j.Logger, and org.apache.commons.logging.Log, respectively.
